lv.id.jc.piglatin.core.WordSpec.title: Word Annotation
lv.id.jc.piglatin.core.WordSpec.narrative:
As a user
I want to validate words
So that I can translate them to Pig Latin

lv.id.jc.piglatin.core.WordsMatcherSpec.title: Words Matcher
lv.id.jc.piglatin.core.WordsMatcherSpec.narrative:
As a user
I want to match words in a sentence
So that I can translate them to Pig Latin

executedFeatures: translate English phrase to Pig Latin
lv.id.jc.piglatin.core.PhraseTranslatorS.title: Pig Latin Translator
lv.id.jc.piglatin.core.PhraseTranslatorS.narrative:
As a user
I want to translate English phrase to Pig Latin
So that I can communicate with my friends

lv.id.jc.piglatin.core.WordTranslatorSpe.title: Word Translator
lv.id.jc.piglatin.core.WordTranslatorSpe.narrative:
As a user
I want to translate words to Pig Latin
So that I can communicate with my friends

executedFeatures: translate method when TranslationService throws exception
should return DOWN when HTTP status code is not 200
should return UP when HTTP status code is 200
should return status code when getAsInt is called
should throw RuntimeException when IOException occurs
